question: Paul Antony has appointed as the Chief Secretary of this state.
explanation: Paul Antony has been appointed as the next Chief Secretary of Kerala. Paul Antony is an IAS Officer of the 1983 batch. He will take charge as the Chief Secretary of Kerala on January 1, 2018. He will work as Chief Secretary tillJune 27, 2018. He replaces K.M. Abraham, who will retire on December 31, 2017. Paul Antony is currently the Additional Chief Secretary in charge of Industries, Power, and Forest departments.
